title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer 

of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 March 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited standard public office (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2023 (2) order come operation 1 march 2023

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Finance. 

to 

(2) References 

the Department of Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business 
transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Department of Finance.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department finance (2) reference department public expenditure national development plan delivery reform contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department finance

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Public Expenditure,
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Public Expenditure, 
National Development Plan Delivery and Reform by or under the provisions of 
an Act specified in column (1) of the Schedule are transferred to the Minister 
for Finance to the extent specified in column (2) of the Schedule opposite the 
mention of the Act so specified. 

to 

the Minister 

(2) References 

for Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform contained in any Act or instrument 
made under an Act and relating to any functions transferred by paragraph (1) 
shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the 
Minister for Finance.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform provision act specified column (1) schedule transferred minister finance extent specified column (2) schedule opposite mention act specified minister (2) reference public expenditure national development plan delivery reform contained act instrument made act relating function transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference minister finance

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Public Expenditure, 
National Development Plan Delivery and Reform is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for Finance, the name of the Minister for Finance shall, in so far as the 
proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted in 
the proceedings for that of the Minister for Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform or added in the proceedings, as may 
be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such 
substitution. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd March, 2023.

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform may, in so far as it relates to a 
function transferred by this Order to the Minister for Finance, be carried on or 
completed from such commencement by the Minister for Finance.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform may far relates function transferred order minister finance carried completed commencement minister finance

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made 
in the exercise of a function transferred by this Order, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect from 
such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Finance. 

to 

the Minister
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister finance minister

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
heading: 7. References
text_raw:
7. References 

for Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform contained in the memorandum and 
articles of association of any company and relating to any function transferred 
by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as 
references to the Minister for Finance.
text_norm: 7 reference public expenditure national development plan delivery reform contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister finance

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before 
the commencement of this Order by the Minister for Public Expenditure, 
National Development Plan Delivery and Reform in connection with the 
functions transferred by this Order are transferred on the commencement to the 
Minister for Finance and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer 
or assignment – 

(a) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Finance, 

(b) 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Finance, and 

(c) 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Finance. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Finance by this Article, which, on the commencement of this Order, are 
standing in the name of the Minister for Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform shall, on the request of the Minister 
for Finance, be transferred into the name of the Minister for Finance. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [89]
